entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assembly.GetEntryAssembly() returns null #28597
  • Version tag info in .csproj is incorrectly detected #28596
  • [ANDROID] - Passing header to Webview #28590
  • iOS ContactProviderExtension Support #28586
    Backlog
  • [.NET 9 WinUI] Unhandled exception when I build MAUI application with enabled AOT #28582
  • CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty #28580
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionView supports ScrollX, ScrollY and ContentSize property like ScrollView does. #28576
    Backlog

Closed

  • Hot Reload and Live Preview won't work if the configuration is not called Debug #28316
  • Cannot create Android archive when project output path on a different drive #28095
  • TapGestureRecognizer on Parent Layout Triggers TapCommand on Windows but Not on Android #28588
  • Update to 9.0.50 breaks CommunityToolkit.Popup #28581
  • [Android, 9.0 Preview 7] Overriding OnKeyUp in MainActivity does not capture keyboard presses #24557
    Backlog
  • The slider in the "Right to left TableView" page is abnormal in Android and iOS #28156
    Backlog
  • MAUI 9 calling .Clear() on an ObservableCollection bound to a listview causes a nullref #28579
  • Blazor Hybrid Android Throws Exception Not Supported Picture-In-Picture(PIP) #28544
    Backlog
  • Cannot print document in BlazorWebView #28372

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Binding.ConverterCulture #28595
    t/breaking 💥, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28594
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28560 #28584
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28583
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Implemented InteractivePopGesture #28577
    area-testing, community ✨

Merged

  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28485
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [inflight/candidate] [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28593
  • [inflight/current] [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28592
  • [ci] Don't use the short url for install script #28591
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Versions.props to sr4.1 #28589
  • [.NET 10] More public APIs related with Entry and Editor, pending TODOs #28467
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-entry, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix HideSoftInputOnTapped Not Working Net9 #28534
    community ✨, area-keyboard, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update arcade net10.0 #28518
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28574
    p/0, .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Fixed ScrollView Orientation Neither issue #27231
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7

Updated

  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • Obsolete ListView and Cell types #28500
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    t/breaking 💥, area-core-hosting, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Make sure we can run everything on arm64 machines #28551
    area-infrastructure, testing-infrastructure, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] - Fix for flaky UITests related to the virtual keyboard in Android and iOS platforms #27876
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.Net10][Proposal][Android] TabbedPage.PopToRootOnTabReselect property #28563
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [tests] Enable back some MemoryLeak tests #28484
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing, memory-leak 💦, testing-reenable, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Windows] Fixed BackButton visibility issue when switching tabs without NavigationPage #28371
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows, Android] Resolved issue with dynamic Header/Footer reassignment in CollectionView. #28403
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Shell Flyout Header and Footer not respecting safe area in landscape mode #28379
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Shell content title not rendering in Full-Screen Mode on MacCatalyst #28468
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10] Replace the obsolete RunJavaScriptTextInputPanel #28531
    area-blazor, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • [NET10] Enable Nullability on ShellPageRendererTracker #28441
    area-controls-shell
  • [Enhancement] Changes in navigation events parameters #28384
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-navigation
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • [2025/03/24] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7

    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR7
  • Support XmlnsDefinitionAttribute in "this" assembly #28090
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Shadows #27701
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix Shapes BackgroundColor invalidation #27398
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Essentials - preferences - prevent Application.Quit() from closing application before SharedPreferences in-memory changes are committed to disk. #27635
    area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • [iOS] Fix AdaptiveTrigger not working as expected #20987
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-window
  • Align the Sender between the gestures when emit the events #28305
    area-gestures
  • Fixed the Header and Footer-Name textbox is cut off in collection view #26947
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing
  • Update the comment for the test properties #27306
    .NET 9 SR7

    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7

    community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7

    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for FlyoutItem in overflow menu not fully interactable #27575
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Prevent the tap that closes an open SwipeView from being propagated to children #24275
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Windows] - Handle Dynamic Updates for CanDrag and AllowDrop in Drag and Drop Gesture #27845
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-gestures, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Item should scrolled based on the GroupHeaderTemplate #28074
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix IsPresented property not updating correctly in FlyoutPage #28471
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, .NET 10.0-preview3
